CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up to MOT and leaves room
MOT and CHI are sitting on the floor with their sides to camera . CHI is looking at toys in front of her on floor
MOT rearranges herself holding a football in one hand
MOT looks down in front of her
MOT looks at toys in front of her
MOT reaches out for book but grabs hold of jack+in+the+box
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and puts it next to her
MOT picks up book and puts hand on jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT moves jack+in+the+box a little to her left and places book next to jack+in+the+box then moves ball away
CHI looks at football then at book
MOT picks up toy duck and squeezes it
MOT holds duck up in front of CHI . <aft> MOT squeezes duck
CHI reaches out for duck and takes it
CHI looks to her left . <aft> CHI looks at duck
<bef> MOT pulls hand back and puts it in lap . MOT leans head forwards towards CHI
CHI turns torso a little to her right
CHI puts duck down on book still holding onto it
CHI lets go of duck and starts to straighten up
CHI continues to look at duck
MOT puts both hands around jack+in+the+box
MOT taps sides of jack+in+the+box with hands
MOT taps jack+in+the+box with finger . <aft> MOT pulls hands back
CHI reaches out for crank with one hand
MOT looks from jack+in+the+box to CHI and then back at jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes jack+in+the+box a little closer to CHI
MOT is still holding onto jack+in+the+box
MOT points to crank with finger . <aft> MOT pulls hand back
MOT watches CHI play with crank
CHI continues to play with crank
CHI looks at top of jack+in+the+box
MOT picks jack+in+the+box up and tilts it so the top is facing CHI
CHI puts both hands on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI turns torso to her left
CHI gets down on hands and knees
MOT puts hands in her lap and leans a little bit to her right
MOT looks from jack+in+the+box to car to jack+in+the+box to car
CHI pushes car towards jack+in+the+box pretending it is driving
CHI follows car with her eyes
CHI lets car bump into jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes car onto book and then pulls it back
CHI turns head to her left and looks at football
MOT turns head to her right . <aft> MOT picks up football
CHI leans to her left and puts car on floor still holding onto it
CHI looks a little bit to her left for a second then looks straight ahead
MOT holds ball out in front of CHI
CHI turns head and looks at ball
CHI leans forwards . <aft> CHI straightens up
while leaning forwards CHI hits car with hand and it turns over
CHI looks straight ahead then turns head to her left and looks at car
MOT holds hands up as though to catch ball
CHI touches car with hand then pulls hand back
MOT stretches hands out towards CHI with palms up
MOT puts hands in her lap
CHI straightens up holding ball in one hand
MOT stretches hand out towards ball with palm up
CHI pulls ball slightly away from MOT
CHI looks at table in front of her
CHI moves hand holding ball up and down a little bit once
<aft> CHI looks up at desk with PCI boxes
MOT lets hand rest on her leg
MOT looks at desk then at CHI
MOT continues to look around in room
MOT looks at and points to items
CHI first looks at car then at pictures on wall
<bef> MOT looks at CHI . MOT looks up at pictures
MOT looks at and points to item
<4 .> MOT points to something else on wall . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks up at item then turns head and starts looking around in room
MOT turns head to look behind her
CHI turns head and looks out in front of her
MOT tilts chair forwards so CHI gets a better view
MOT turns head and taps bears on pillow with finger
MOT looks at pillow then at CHI
CHI turns head to her right and looks straight ahead
CHI looks down at ball and up at MOT
MOT looks at chair . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
<aft> MOT grabs jack+in+the+box and moves it a little to her left
<bef> MOT looks up at CHI . <aft> MOT inclines head
MOT turns jack+in+the+box so clown is facing CHI
CHI crawls towards clown on her knees
<bef> CHI grabs onto head of clown . CHI starts playing with lid
CHI places jack+in+the+box on book and plays with it
CHI now has her back to camera
CHI looks to her left then in front of her
MOT pats floor in front of her with hand

e.ga: on floor in front of MOT

u.a: MOT grabs hold of jack+in+the+box and takes it from CHI
CHI turns head and follows jack+in+the+box with eyes
MOT points to jack+in+the+box then looks at CHI
MOT moves jack+in+the+box closer to her . <aft> MOT puts hands back in lap
CHI looks down at her left then reaches for the ball on the floor beside her
CHI looks at car to her right
<aft> MOT reaches hand out for ball
CHI gets up on her knees and stretches arm holding ball out towards MOT
CHI looks down to her left at toy duck
CHI puts duck to her mouth
CHI moves duck down in front of her
<bef> CHI puts duck to her mouth . CHI starts chewing on it then puts it down in front of her
CHI squeezes duck gently then puts the duck down on the book . <aft> CHI moves duck off the book onto the floor
<bef> CHI straightens up . CHI rearranges her position
<bef> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box . CHI looks down in front of her . <aft> CHI looks at duck
MOT points to book then pulls hand back
CHI reaches out for duck and picks it up
<bef> CHI grabs hold of duck with both hands and starts squeezing it
not clear that CHI wants MOT to do anything with duck
CHI holds duck out towards MOT
MOT takes duck . <aft> MOT transfers duck to other hand
CHI puts hand on MOT's leg then reaches towards football in MOT's other hand
MOT looks down at toys in her hand

CHI holds ball up in front of her
CHI looks at ball then reaches for duck in MOT's hand
MOT looks at duck then at CHI
CHI reaches out for and takes duck and then turns head to her left
CHI looks at duck then at wastebasket
not clear that this is communicative
CHI moves to her left on her knees towards chair
CHI walks around in a semi circle on her knees
CHI looks up at desk . <aft> CHI looks down to her right
<bef> MOT looks at car . MOT looks at CHI
MOT picks up car then moves it a little bit behind her and gives it a push
MOT looks at CHI then at truck
truck comes towards CHI and hits toy duck
<bef> CHI turns around so she is facing wastebasket
MOT takes car and moves it further back
CHI puts ball on floor and reaches out for truck
truck rolls towards CHI and stops right in front of her
CHI reaches out for truck then leans forwards and pushes it a little further away from her
MOT watches CHI play with car
MOT taps floor in front of her with fingers
MOT stops tapping . <aft> MOT reaches hand out towards car then pulls it back
CHI crawls in the direction of door and pushes truck in front of her
CHI continues to crawl towards door then turns car around and straightens up
CHI turns around facing MOT with one leg stretched out . CHI looks down
CHI leans head forwards and puts one hand on floor
CHI lets duck fall to the ground then leans forwards and starts touching taped cross on floor
CHI looks at cross taped on floor
<bef> CHI looks up to her right . CHI glances at tape then looks up to her right toward camera
MOT turns head and looks in the same direction as CHI
<bef> MOT turns head and looks at CHI
CHI looks up in the same direction as before . <aft> CHI looks at ball
ball rolls towards MOT and hits her leg
MOT follows ball with eyes and lifts leg to see where it went
CHI gets down on hands and knees
CHI crawls towards tape and touches it
CHI gets up holding onto MOT's leg for support
MOT looks down in front of her
CHI looks out in front of her then turns her head and looks at car next to chair and at wastebasket
MOT looks at CHI then at car
CHI looks down to her left
MOT puts hand up to CHI's arm
MOT takes hand away from arm
MOT puts arm behinds CHI's back
CHI moves around wiggling her body a bit
MOT moves torso back and forth pretending she is dancing
MOT reaches out for book . <aft> MOT picks up book and places it in front of CHI letting it lean on seat of chair
MOT points to something on cover and looks at CHI
CHI looks at item on cover of book
MOT points to item on page then to opposite page
MOT points to items and moves finger around on page . <aft> MOT looks up at CHI
CHI follows MOT's finger with eyes
MOT puts fingers under page so it is ready to be turned
<bef> MOT looks at page . MOT looks at CHI
CHI bends down and touches jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at page then at jack+in+the+box
meaning "you're right . I don't want this"
CHI turns head to her left
CHI puts hand on MOT's shoulder
CHI moves other hand towards MOT
MOT points to and looks at something on page
MOT puts fingers under page . <aft> MOT turns page
MOT points to something on page . <aft> MOT looks up at CHI
CHI moves foot closer to MOT
CHI turns head around towards door
INV explains about Small Scale Activity to MOT and puts toys out on table . INV leaves
CHI is sitting in high chair at table playing with toys and MOT is sitting in chair next to door filling out forms
INV has MOT sit on chair next to CHI and explains to her about the Forbidden Object task then gets the forbidden object out
INV places forbidden object on table in front of CHI
CHI looks at toys in front of her on table
INV puts one toy down in front of CHI and picks up the remaining toys
INV grabs hold of forbidden object
forbidden object falls towards CHI and it looks like some of the little balls hit CHI's face
MOT reaches hand out towards forbidden object
MOT puts hand on base of forbidden object
<bef> MOT puts other hand on base of forbidden object
MOT looks down but not at forbidden object
CHI looks down at toy in front of her
<bef> MOT looks at CHI . <1 .> MOT looks at forbidden object
MOT looks at INV . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI leans head forwards towards forbidden object
MOT inclines head to get a better view of CHI
CHI looks down at toys in front of her
CHI starts playing with toy to her left
CHI picks up toy she is playing with
<aft> MOT stops looking at INV and moves her gaze a little bit to her left
CHI holds toy out towards INV
INV reaches hand out towards toy
CHI looks down at handle of chair
CHI puts hand around handle of chair
CHI turns towards MOT and raises her arms
INV grabs hold of forbidden object
CHI follows forbidden object with eyes
INV explains about PCI boxes to MOT and begins to leave
CHI is sitting in front of little chair with left side to camera and MOT has picked up a box and is walking towards CHI
MOT sits down . <aft> MOT puts box next to her
MOT puts hand in box . <aft> MOT pushes box closer to CHI and pulls hand back
CHI leans forward and puts hands on floor
CHI gets up on her knees
CHI crawls to box on her knees
MOT bends head forwards a little to look in box
CHI has now reached box and looks in it with hands resting on one of its sides
CHI puts both hands on ball
MOT reaches hand out a little bit
MOT puts hand under CHI's chin . <aft> MOT wipes CHI's mouth
CHI puts both hands on ball
MOT reaches hands out towards ball
MOT rolls ball towards her and picks it up
<bef> CHI walks to ball on her knees
CHI has her back to the camera
MOT holds hands out towards CHI
CHI looks at bear on chair
CHI holds hands out towards bear and starts walking towards chair on her knees
MOT turns head and looks at bear
<1 .> MOT turns head and looks at CHI
CHI continues to walk towards bear
MOT picks up ball and holds it out in front of CHI
CHI grabs hold of chair with one hand and puts other hand on ball
CHI reaches out for bear and pulls it closer
CHI turns torso around and puts bear on MOT's leg
MOT takes bear and leans it against the wastebasket
MOT puts ball on floor holding onto it with one hand
MOT reaches out for ball with hand . <aft> MOT tries to pick up ball but misses
MOT looks at ball . MOT picks up ball and holds it out in front of her
CHI kneels down and walks closer to MOT on her knees
CHI moves arms up and down once
CHI gets down on hands and knees
CHI reaches hand out towards ball and puts hand on it
ball rolls off to the right
MOT grabs bear . <aft> MOT leans forward and leans bear on little chair
CHI turns head to her left to see where bear went
CHI starts turning around holding onto MOT
CHI falls forwards as MOT leans back
MOT puts hand on CHI's arm and puts ball on floor in front of CHI
CHI slides off MOT's lap and puts both hands on ball
MOT looks at CHI and points at bear . <aft> MOT looks at bear
CHI walks towards bear with teddy
MOT tries to grab CHI's shirt but does not succeed
CHI starts to rock ball back and forth putting her weight on alternating knees
MOT holds hand out towards ball
CHI turns torso to the right a little bit
CHI crawls towards box . <aft> CHI throws ball in box
CHI starts moving away from box
CHI turns around so she is facing MOT
MOT reaches out for box on desk
CHI looks at boxes on desk
CHI left side is facing camera
CHI turns torso to her right
CHI has her back to camera
MOT puts hands out to open box
MOT changes her mind about opening box and pats floor next to her with hand
MOT puts box next to box with ball
CHI turns head and torso around to see where box went
MOT leans forward towards CHI and picks CHI up
CHI is now sitting in front of wastebasket facing camera
<aft> MOT picks up box and puts it on floor in front of CHI and then takes lid off
MOT puts lid down on floor next to her
MOT glances at lid then looks at contents of box
MOT holds towel out in front of her and starts to lift it up
MOT lifts towel all the way up so her face cannot be seen
MOT lifts towel up so it covers her face
CHI leans forwards and puts hand on floor
MOT holds towel out towards CHI
MOT lifts towel up so it covers all of her
CHI gets up on her knees
CHI reaches hand out towards towel
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI
CHI turns torso to her left
CHI loses her balance . CHI puts hand on floor
CHI straightens up and reaches out for towel
CHI takes towel . <aft> CHI walks a few steps on her knees with towel and then throws it on the floor
CHI picks up towel and throws it on floor
MOT lifts towel up so it covers her face
MOT lifts towel up so it covers her face
CHI walks sideways on her knees towards MOT then stretches arms out to the sides and grabs hold of towel
MOT leans forwards and lowers towel
MOT inclines head to get a better view of CHI
CHI shakes towel up and down once
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI so it covers her
MOT lowers towel and inclines head to get a better view of CHI
CHI starts to lift towel up
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI so it covers all of her then lets go of towel . <aft> MOT inclines head
CHI is resting her head on hand and towel
CHI straightens up and pulls towel down
CHI puts towel down on floor next to her
CHI starts walking towards lid on her knees
MOT puts lid on .<aft> MOT puts box on floor next to box with ball
MOT takes box down from table
